column1: Gaddi Annaram is a census town and Municipality in Ranga Reddy district of India. It is located in the common capital area shared between the states of Telangana and Andhra Pradesh.
Gaddi Annaram is located at 17.3653°N 78.5992°E﻿ / 17.3653; 78.5992. It has an average elevation of 481 meters (1581 feet).

column2: Gaddi annaram had a population of 53
column3: 622. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Gaddi annaram has an average literacy rate of 81%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 85%
column5: and female literacy is 76%. In Gaddi annaram
column6: 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.
